sentences.sContent: Sarah lay there peacefully, the child nestling by her side.
sentences.sCn: 萨拉安静地躺在那儿，孩子偎依在她身边。

sentences.sContent: He nestled his head against her shoulder.
sentences.sCn: 他把头靠在她的肩膀上。

synos.tran: 舒适地坐定；偎依；半隐半现地处于

words.tran: 安顿下来；筑巢；把…安置于巢中（nestle的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to move into a comfortable position, pressing your head or body against someone or against something soft
